name: Traffic Hard Truck Simulator
description:
Traffic Hard Truck Simulator - the best simulator of professional truck driver life!

Try on the role of a truck driver! Carry loads, earn money, buy new trucks and trailers, become the ace of trucking!

Improve your driver and your truck! Travel across country roads and highways, you will get a unique driving experience and feel like a real truck driver!

Features:
- Various trucks from russian gazelle and kamaz to popular euro trucks
- Realistic physics of trucks and trailers
- Tuning trucks
- The possibility of buying trailers and semi-trailers
- System of improving the skills of the truck driver
- Realistic locations with driving across country roads and highways
- Three kinds of control (tilt, buttons or touch steering wheel)
- Different weather conditions and the cycle of day / night
- Detailed interiors for all the trucks
- Intelligent Traffic System
- Several modes of races with unique jobs

Love trucks? Always wanted to be a truck driver? Then Traffic Hard Truck Simulator - your choice!
